attributes.action: Immediate action to provide proper PPE for NHS staff and COVID19 Tests.
attributes.additional_details:
NHS are requesting the government to take immediate action and also provide support and care for the fellow workers in NHS who are fighting this pandemic.

To help us to save everyone please provide all the nhs staff with:

1.Testing for Covid 19 so that we are not passing it to others.

2.Provide funding for Proper PPE so that we can look after others.

3.Proper guidance and support to general public
attributes.background: NHS staff are requesting the government to provide care and support for the NHS staff during this hard time we are facing due to the outbreak of corona Virus /COVID 19. for example Personal Protective Equipment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
